alfredsnippet.snippet:
# lower to upper
$ echo "WELCOME to {geeks} to geeks 3   spaces" | tr "[a-z]" "[A-Z]"
WELCOME TO {GEEKS} TO GEEKS 3   SPACES

# lower to upper
$ echo "WELCOME to {geeks} to geeks 3   spaces" | tr "[:lower:]" "[:upper:]"
WELCOME TO {GEEKS} TO GEEKS 3   SPACES

# translate brackets
$ echo "WELCOME to {geeks} to    geeks 3   spaces" | tr "{}" "()"
WELCOME to (geeks) to    geeks 3   spaces

# sqeeze
$ echo "WELCOME to {geeks} to geeks 3   spaces" | tr -s "[:space:]" ' '
WELCOME to {geeks} to geeks 3 spaces

# delete
$ echo "WELCOME to {geeks} to geeks 3   spaces" | tr -d "[:digit:]"
WELCOME to {geeks} to geeks    spaces

# complement digits
$ echo "WELCOME to {geeks} to geeks 3   spaces" | tr -cd "[:digit:]"
3
alfredsnippet.name: bash tr translate command
